This dungeon is way more dungeony than I: Did you know that originally, “dungeon” referred to the biggest tower in a castle? It’s what they called the castle “keep.”
Ugh, how long has it been since I’ve heard Reynn go off on one of her educational rants? She must be pretty upset.
The more upset she gets, the more she tries to cover it up by spouting random trivia.
You know where the word “trivia” comes from?
